a.title: PSSA Math Location: Troy Area Junior/Senior High School, 150 High Street, Troy PA

The Troy Area School District Board of Education will hold a student affairs committee meeting at 2:00 P.M. on Monday, April 27, 2020.

 

The meeting will be held in the Troy Area School District Administration Building, 68 Fenner Avenue, Troy PA  16947.

 

Please click the link below to join the webinar:

Password: 187684
